偯字的基本解释

偯
yǐ
哭的余声：“童子哭不偯”。
曲折委婉。

偯字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yǐ］
［《廣韻》於豈切，上尾，影。］
拖长哭的余声。亦指哀伤。

偯字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　偯； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页111第28
【廣韻】於豈切【集韻】【韻會】隱豈切，?音扆。哭餘聲。【禮·雜記】童子哭不偯。又【閒傳】大功之哭，三曲而偯。【鄭註】聲餘從容也。◎按大功哀殺，故哭聲宛偯。童子未能成聲，直遂其哀而已。

偯字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
偯字的起名意思

暂无。

偯
Basic explanation of words
偯
yǐ
The aftermath of crying: "The boy can't cry".
The twists and turns are euphemistic.
偯
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yǐ］
["Guang Yun" Yu Qiqie, upper tail, shadow. ]
Prolong the lingering sound of crying. Also refers to grief.
偯
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset] [Human Character Department] 　偯; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 111 28
[Guang Yun] Yu Qiqie【Jiyun】【Yunhui】Hidden Qiqie,? Sound. Crying. 【Rite·Miscellaneous】The boy can't cry. Also 【Xianzhuan】The cry of great merit, three songs and wailing. [Zheng's Note] The sound is also calm. ◎According to the great merits, we mourn and kill, so the crying is full. The boy failed to make a sound, but he mourned.
偯

Name meaning

yǐ
сущ. завывание (при плаче)
哭不偯 плакать без завывания
